name: Quarantined (Deadline Studios)
description:
A 2D survival video game about a family of four surviving throughout a pandemic while quarantined inside their home. The player must collect supplies and resources for them and their family to survive. This can be achieved by going to work and earn money, go to the grocery store, and buy supplies. They must also connect with their family members to gain their trust that they could see another day. Be careful though with what you choose, your actions have consequences.

After playing the game please answer our survey for your feedback:
https://forms.gle/kgJug2ntLCkncvp97

Thank you very much!
